t = int(input())
s = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
l = []
for i in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 a=n//25
 b=n%25
 if(n%25==0):
  p = s[::-1]*(a)
 else:
  p = s[:1+b][::-1] + s[::-1]*(a)
 l.append(p)
for i in l:
 print(i)
